scripts.install:all: npm run install:data-service && npm run install:cms && npm run install:portal
scripts.build:all: npm run build:data-service && npm run build:cms && npm run build:portal
scripts.start:all: concurrently --kill-others "npm --prefix ./cms run cms:start" "npm --prefix ./data-service run data-service:start" "npm --prefix ./portal run portal:start"
scripts.install:cms: echo 'install deps for cms' && npm --prefix ./cms ci
scripts.install:data-service: echo 'install deps for data-service' && npm --prefix ./data-service ci
scripts.install:portal: echo 'install deps for portal' && npm --prefix ./portal ci
